customer_name: Lady Boss Grooming & World Of Pets

citations.narrative:
The applicant sold a fox at the Wild Side auction in April of 2023. The applicant also posted a pair of kinkajous for sale
online on April 30, 2023. No person shall operate as a dealer without a valid license. The applicant shall cease brokering
until a valid license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
The applicant sold a fox at the Wild Side auction in April of 2023. The applicant also posted a pair of kinkajous for sale 
online on April 30, 2023. No person shall operate as a dealer without a valid license. The applicant shall cease brokering 
until a valid license is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
